name: Soil contamination status
description: Status score scaled 0-1 for contamination

name: Marine debris status
description: Status of marine debris, measured by FAD groundings

name: Coastal protection weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by habitat protection rank for corals (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in pal-scores)

name: Carbon storage weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by carbon storage capacity for rainforests (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in pal-scores)

name: Habitat weights
description: List of habitats in each region (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in pal-scores)

name: Coral reef extent (area)
description: Area (km2) of coral habitat

name: Coral reef status
description: Coral condition based on the percent of live coral cover in different reef zones

name: Coral reef trend
description: Trend in coral condition based on Micronesia georegion

name: Rainforest extent (area)
description: Area (km2) of rainforest habitat

name: Rainforest status
description: Rainforest status based on area of rainforest compared to potential area

name: Rainforest trend
description: Estimated change in  rainforest area over time

name: Carbon storage status
description: Carbon storage status based on rainforest habitats

name: Coastal protection status
description: Coastal protection status determined by coral reef condition

name: Iconic species status
description: Average status for iconic species by region

name: Inland protected areas
description: Proportion of inland protected areas within 1km

name: Offshore protected areas
description: Proportion of marine protected areas within 3nm offshore

name: Ocean acidification pressure
description: Pressure due to increasing ocean acidification, scaled using biological thresholds

name: Sea level rise pressure
description: Pressure due to rising mean sea level

name: Sea surface temperature pressure
description: Pressure due to increasing extreme sea surface temperature events

name: UV radiation pressure
description: Pressure due to increasing frequency of UV anomolies

name: Fishing pressure
description: Pressure due to bycatch from recreational and sustenance fishing

name: Habitat destruction pressure
description: Pressure due to habitat destruction

name: Management pressure
description: Pressure due to lack of management of natural resources

name: Soil contamination pressure
description: Soil contamination from WWII military operations

name: Marine debris pressure
description: Marine debris pollution from grounded Fishing Aggregration Devices (FADs)

name: Alien species pressure
description: Measure of harmful invasive species

name: Resource access opportunities status
description: Measure of access to recreational fishing opportunities

name: Climate change management
description: Measure of resilience from cimate change management plans

name: Ecosystem diversity
description: Marine species condition (same calculation and data as the species subgoal status score)  calculated within  50 nm of shoreline as a proxy for ecological integrity

name: Fishing management
description: Estimated resilience to fishing pressure based on monitoring and effectiveness of offshore management plans

name: Fishing regulations
description: Estimated resilience to fishing pressure based on designation of offshore protected areas

name: Habitat management
description: Estimated resilience to habitat destruction based on monitoring and effectiveness of offshore management plans

name: Habitat regulations
description: Estimated resilience to habitat destruction based on designation of inland and offshore protected areas

name: Alien species management
description: Estimated resilience to invasive species based on management plans to monitor and control invasive species

name: Alien species regulations
description: Estimated resilience to invasive species based on regulations to prevent introduction and spread

name: Area of Palmyra OHI region
description: Area of the Palmyra OHI region 50nm, weights used to calculate global score

name: Employment status
description: Number of FTE jobs on Palmyra relative to the reference point

name: Scientific papers status
description: Number of scientific papers published annually relative to the reference point

name: Species status
description: Overall measure of species extinction risk based on IUCN status of species within each region

name: Species trend
description: Overall measure of species extinction risk trends based on change in IUCN status of species within each region

name: Tourism and recreation status
description: Status of tourism on Palmyra Atoll

name: Strength of governance
description: World Governance Indicators (WGI) six combined scores
